event_description_short: Learn the basics of building websites.
event_description_long: This workshop covers HTML, CSS, and introductory JavaScript to help you start your web development journey.

event_description_short: A beginner-friendly introduction to AI.
event_description_long: Discover how artificial intelligence works, its applications, and how to get started with machine learning.

event_description_short: Code, create, and compete in our hackathon!
event_description_long: Join developers, designers, and innovators for a 24-hour hackathon to solve real-world tech challenges and win exciting prizes.

event_image_alt: Data analysis charts on a laptop
event_description_short: Unlock the power of Python for data analysis.
event_description_long: This online workshop introduces libraries like pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib to analyze and visualize data effectively.

event_description_short: Learn how to protect yourself online.
event_description_long: Explore fundamental cybersecurity concepts, including password protection, phishing, and securing your digital presence.

event_description_short: Introduction to cloud computing technologies.
event_description_long: Learn about cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud, and understand how businesses leverage the cloud for scalability.

event_description_short: A deep dive into modern frontend frameworks.
event_description_long: This bootcamp covers React, Angular, and Vue, helping you choose the right framework for your next project.

event_description_short: Demystify blockchain and cryptocurrencies.
event_description_long: Learn the fundamentals of blockchain technology, its applications, and how it powers cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum.

event_thumbnail_alt: A person using a VR headset
event_description_short: Explore augmented and virtual reality development.
event_description_long: This hands-on workshop introduces Unity and Unreal Engine for creating immersive AR/VR applications.

event_description_short: Meet fellow full-stack developers.
event_description_long: An informal gathering to share full-stack development experiences, tools, and best practices over food and drinks.

event_description_short: Learn to deploy and manage applications with Kubernetes.
event_description_long: A workshop on the fundamentals of Kubernetes, including pods, services, and deployments, to help streamline app development.

event_image_alt: Developers working on a game project
event_description_short: Start building your first video game.
event_description_long: An introduction to game design and development using Unity. Learn the basics of 3D modeling, scripting, and gameplay mechanics.

event_description_short: Understand serverless architecture and its benefits.
event_description_long: This session covers serverless platforms like AWS Lambda and Firebase, highlighting their use cases and how to build scalable apps without managing servers.

event_description_short: Learn how to secure funding for your tech startup.
event_description_long: This workshop provides insights into creating compelling pitches, identifying investors, and managing funding rounds effectively.

event_description_short: Build cross-platform mobile apps with React Native.
event_description_long: Explore React Native and learn how to create performant, scalable apps for both Android and iOS using a single codebase.

event_description_short: Learn the basics of DevOps practices and tools.
event_description_long: This session introduces concepts like CI/CD pipelines, containerization with Docker, and orchestration with Kubernetes.

event_description_short: Master the fundamentals of RESTful APIs.
event_description_long: This workshop covers designing, building, and documenting APIs using tools like Postman, Flask, and Express.js.

event_description_short: Bring your data to life with D3.js.
event_description_long: Learn how to use D3.js to create stunning and interactive data visualizations for the web.

event_description_short: An introduction to the world of quantum computing.
event_description_long: Understand the basics of quantum computing, its potential applications, and tools like IBM Quantum Experience.

event_description_short: Optimize team workflows with Agile practices.
event_description_long: Learn how to implement Agile methodologies, including Scrum and Kanban, to boost productivity and collaboration.
